title: Students with Above Average Scores in All Subjects
description: The school wants to provide special recognition to students who have scored above the average score in all subjects. They need a list of such students along with their scores in each subject. Write a query to retrieve the full names and scores of students who have scored above the average in Bangla, English, Arts, Math, and Science.
hint:
To find those who score above the mean,
Use subqueries that aren't seen.
Calculate the average first,
Then compare to find the burst.
